content:
I've been coding for around 5 years now. I started out programming using the popular language Python, but have since moved on to working with programming languages like PHP and JavaScript to built websites and web applications.

I honestly build anything and everything that I feel like building â€” from games to useful tools, to open source projects. I've just recently started experimenting with mobile app development with Flutter, as well as Laravel (PHP framework) development.

Below is every open-sourced bundle of pixels I've built since February 27, 2018. Check out what I've done!
